title: Donaldson v. Anderson, NBA Playoffs, and ROCK, PAPER, SCISSORS
itunes:title: Donaldson v. Anderson, NBA Playoffs, and ROCK, PAPER, SCISSORS
description:
Join Michael Barr and guest host Damian Sassower as they chat the latest from the PGA Championship, the kerfuffle between Josh Donaldson and Tim Anderson, and the excitement of the NBA Playoffs leading to high TV ratings.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
